column5:
• Are you interested in outdoor activities?
  • DAILY Which activities do you do in your daily life?:
    • Watch television
    • Reading books
    • Listening to music
    • Painting
    • Play board games
    • Gardening
    • Caring for animals
    • Watch movies
    • Go to the countryside
    • Housework activities
    • Sport
    Say the one corresponding to you

column3: ARE YOU INTERESTED IN OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES
column5: <think><set name="topic">OUTDOOR</set></think><think><set name="outdoor_activities">yes</set></think>                Oh#Comma what outdoor activity are you interested in?
